column4: question.   i want to use ubuntu with xfce.   I have installed "breezy badger" (with gnome) on my system.   to use xfce, do i have to reinstall with another version or can i some how add xfce to my install??
you can run both just have to make the selection before you login to get xfce rather than KDE/Gnome
you do not need to reinstall...just need to do an sudo apt-get install xubuntu-desktop
